forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Under a canopy of mostly cloudy skies, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a gentle embrace of moisture in the early hours, with a mild low lingering around 59 degrees. The west-southwest breeze whispers through the city at a comfortable pace, setting the stage for an evolving day. As the morning unfolds, the clouds will gradually yield to a canvas of sunlight, transforming the atmosphere into a delightfully warm embrace, with the high reaching near 69. The afternoon will see a subtle cooling as temperatures drop to around 66, invigorated by gusts of wind that dance through the streets, occasionally teasing with a briskness reminiscent of autumn’s arrival.

For the day ahead, layers will be your ally—consider a light sweater or a breathable jacket that can be shed to enjoy the warmth of the afternoon sun. The persistent marine layer may linger in pockets, offering glimpses of fog curling around the Bay Area, yet dissipating as the sun reigns higher. As you navigate the day, it beckons for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a stop at a cozy café, where the lingering scent of fresh pastries mingles with the sea breeze. Embrace these moments, for they capture the essence of the city’s character, cloaked in mist yet illuminated by the promise of sunlight.
